BevelDistance: Distance that each beveled mesh edge is inset from its initial position
Subdivisions: Number of edge loops added along the bevel faces
RoundWeight: Roundness of the bevel. Ignored if Subdivisions = 0.
bInferMaterialID: If true, when faces on either side of a beveled mesh edges have the same Material ID, beveled edge will be set to that Material ID. Otherwise SetMaterialID is used.
SetMaterialID: Material ID to set on the new faces introduced by bevel operation, unless bInferMaterialID=true and non-ambiguous MaterialID can be inferred from adjacent faces
